TEXT.TITLE: THE BANKING CENTER <TBCX.O> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 25 cts Net 3,081,000 vs 2,063,000 Nine months Shr 86 cts Net 10.5 mln vs 6,966,000 Assets 1.43 billion vs 1.30 billion Deposits 912.5 mln vs 875.8 mln NOTE: Company converted to a stock savings bank on Aug 13, 1986. 1986 results include operations of Realtech Realtors, which was acquired in 1986. 1987 results include operations of Burgdorff Realtors, acquired in December 1986; Cornerstone Mortgage Co, acquired in July 1987; Centerbank Mortgage Co, acquired in July 1987; and Center Capital Corp, formed in August 1987. Reuter
